name: The Altered Lands
description:
Lore:

the daughter of the great king Eleandor, Princess Vanessa, left the court at a young age in search of adventure. Years later she ended up in a small village to help the citizens and finally settle into his fields.
Vanessa’s father, brother and sister arrived in the village to visit for a couple of days. However, Vanessa's sister wanted to stay for a few more days. Darkness is growing in the east and one dark day knights of death arrive in the village slaughtering all the inhabitants. Vanessa and her sister escaped, but her sister was caught by the knights during the getaway.
This is where the story of Altered lands begins when Princess Vanessa sets out in search of her sister.

Key features:

  • Intensive and immersive fight mechanics which contains combo strikes, blocking, spells and dodging.
  • Stealth Mechanics including stealth kills and avoiding getting caught by the guards.
  • wide range of weapons and items including swords, axes, bows, guns, armors, crafting materials, etc...
  • Realistic and immersive worlds with a lot of treasures and hidden stuff.
